not_enough_chips: You cannot bet this amount of chips because you wouldn't have enough to play your hand
not_enough_chips_next: You don't have enough chips to place a Pair Plus bet because you wouldn't have enough chips to play
pair_win: You won %s chips with your Pair Plus bet (Multiplier: x%s)
player_win: Your hand won, you won %s chips
player_ante_win: Your hand won, you won %s chips (Ante multiplier: x%s)
dealer_not_qual: Push, Dealer did not qualify. You received %s chips.
dealer_ante_not_qual: Push, Dealer did not qualify. You received %s chips (Ante multiplier: x%s)
no_respond: You didn't respond to the dealer in time. You folded your cards
